author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It may be surprising to realize which movies are more than a decade old these days. As such, it may be even more shocking to learn that an Academy Award winning movie from 2010 is finally getting a sequel after fifteen years. The original 2010 film was very much a result of its time, though [...]

The post Academy Award Winning Movie Getting Sequel 15 Years Later appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Academy Award Winning Movie Getting Sequel 15 Years Later
